name: Spider Wars (itch)
description:
Spider Wars is a Twin-stick shooter kind of game in which you need to destroy as many enemy Spider-Robots as possible.

All the C# scripts made for the game are mine, except for one (a script that does IK or inverse-kinematics maths). The rest of the elements in the game: sound, textures, models, etc; are not mine.
